      • createErrorGuardSenderSideLogic

        public static org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList createErrorGuardSenderSideLogic(PetriNet.PetriNet pn,
                                                                ComponentInstance ci,
                                                                edu.laas.aadl.dependency.FindSenderOrReceiverErrorModel fsrem,
                                                                org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList and,
                                                                org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList UpperComponentsEM,
                                                                boolean flagGuardTrans)
        This method is used in the transformation of guardIn, guardOut and guardEvent properties
        Parameters:
        pn -
        ci -
        and -
        UpperComponentsEM -
        flagGuardTransition - boolean, true if called by the GuardTransitionTransformation process
        Returns:
        EList containing 2 elements: a EList of Structure objects (storing info on the propagation places) and a list of BooleanExpression objects that represents all the combinations for which transitions are to be created
